GSD.product_version: versions from v5.0 to before v5.10.157
GSD.description:
bridge: switchdev: Fix memory leaks when changing VLAN protocol

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.157 by commit 347f1793b573466424c550f2748ed837b6690fe7, it was introduced in version v5.0 by commit 279737939a8194f02fa352ab4476a1b241f44ef4. For more details please see the references link.
